oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Mamie Louise Hopper (Harper) in the classroom with others, 1930s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of Mamie Louise Hopper (Harper) in the classroom, most likely at Knoxville College. She is seated second from the right, in a white blouse, reading from a book. Circa 1933-1937.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hopper (Harper), Mamie Louise
Knoxville College

Knoxville (Tenn.)
